title: [Lumnea Meadow]
description: Several tables, skirted in various colors and festooned with multicolored ribbons, have been set out in a semicircle.  Trays of edibles lie atop each table, constantly refreshed as elven maids scurry between them and a nearby covered wagon.

Several tables, skirted in various colors and festooned with multicolored ribbons, have been set out in a semicircle.  Trays of edibles lie atop each table, constantly refreshed as elven maids scurry between them and a nearby covered wagon.  Large glaes-paned lanterns hang from tall ironwork posts, illuminating the tables with a golden amber nimbus.
paths: Obvious paths: north, east, southwest, west
